alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:39AM CDT until April 05 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... East central Saline County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1039 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Southwest Little Rock, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Argenta... Otter Creek... Gravel Ridge... Meto... Olmstead... Protho Junction... Lakewood... Camp Robinson... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
